producers.title: Our Producers
producers.intro: Coffee, matcha, bread, eggs — every product has a story. We only work with those who share our obsession for doing things right.

questions.reservationAnswer: We don't take reservations — we believe in spontaneous brunch. But don't worry, turnover is quick and we always find a spot. Weekends before 10am are usually quieter.
questions.wifiAnswer: Yes, free and fast. Perfect for getting some work done. But if you're staying all day, we ask you to order something every couple of hours — we're a small café and need the tables.
questions.dogsAnswer: Absolutely! We have a terrace where your furry friend is welcome. Inside we can't due to health regulations, but we always have fresh water outside.
questions.parkingAnswer: Yes, free parking right next to the venue. There's also blue zone parking nearby if it's full.
questions.eventsAnswer: Yes, for small groups outside regular hours. Email us at hola@dirtyrabbit.es with your idea and let's see how we can make magic.
questions.dietaryAnswer: Yes. Vegetarian and vegan options on the menu, plant-based milks available. For gluten-free, ask — we have several options but the kitchen isn't 100% gluten-free.
